rev.comment: /* Biography */ the current sentence strucutre makes it ambiguous whether the school or Cho himself was "noted by the Washington Post for high achievement"

/* Biography */ Time period is confusing here -- it has nothing to do with the early 90s or whatever. It refers to the chronological age of the immigrants. Used by many other groups and the ESL teache
